reviewText:
I was looking forward to viewing this particular DVD, as I had seen it advertised years ago in martial arts magazines but when it did arrive, the first thing I noticed was when I had opened the case, the disc was not securely clipped to its base and when I seen the terrible, scratched up condition of its surface, I assumed it was due to the dvd being transported via the mail service.
Although I am somewhat disappointed, I will eventually try again to order another copy. I just hope that the next time, it will come through the delivery service in much better shape.
They should do the instruction of falling, grappling, and show technique step by step, but instead they just do the competition techniques
